TopicTitle: Just to give you something to think about

Articles.Content:
If the World were 100 People:

50 would be female

50 would be male

26 would be children

74 adults, 8 of whom would be 65 and older

There would be:

60 Asians

15 Africans

14 people from the Americas

11 European

83 would be able to read and write, 17 would not

7 with a college degree

22 would own or share a computer

1 would be dying of starvation

15 would be undernourished

21 would be overweight

13 people would have no clean, safe water to drink

48 would live on less then $2 USD per day

1 out of 2 children would live in poverty

22 would not have electricity

16 would have no toilets

19 would have unimproved toilets

Be grateful for beeing one of the privileged every day on this planet and think about this the next time you feel like you life is miserable.

If you are reading this there are plenty of others whose lifes are much more miserable then yours.

Source of the data: http://www.100people.org
